content.description: This is a nice buildering problem which ascends the corner created by the left turret.  It makes for a nice stemming problem.  A belay is probably wisest since it's the last 2 feet that make this line exciting.  Pick a cool day, don't sweat, check out the top before committing sans rope.
content.location: In the corner on the left side of the left turret on the West face.

pathTokens: Kenmore Walls aka Back Bay Fens

content.description:
This wall is up to 15 foot tall. Charlesgate is located near the overpass linking Storrow Dr and Park Dr. 

  L->R:   A. Break from School, 9   B. Hocus Pocus, 8   C. Mumbo Jumbo, 8   D. Abracadabra, 8 

  E. The Nose, 9   F. Wall Of The Early Morning Fright, 19   G. The NA, 10 

  Apparently, there is a overhanging retaining wall for the overpass with a couple routes.
